topics.body:
This might sound like crazy talk, but I think I'm starting to grow out of games and that.

I love the hell out of classic games and there's a lot of good games, but it just seems as though even though CoD is losing popularity hard people are still obsessed with making generic fps games and pushing out games as fast as possible rather than actually attempting to make them remarkable.

There's a lot of good games, there's a lot of decent games but not every game is "11/10 Mountain Dew!  Doritos!  [Vuvuzela orchestra with dubstep playing in the background]" -IGN.
